page.title: 16A DAY IN MY LIFE
page.content: We have a vegetable garden but because the house is 950 feet above sea level it is quite difficult to grow them but we do grow a lot of lettuce, carrots, peas and potatoes. We usually go on holiday in the summer. Last summer we flew from Gatwick airport to Faro in Portugal. We stayed in Albufiera for two weeks. Once we took a boat on the river Thames for a week and another time we hired a boat on the Norfolk Broads. One of my grandmothers lives in Hertfordshire and the other near Bristol so I don't see them very often but they do come and stay with us. Once or twice a week my father goes to London on the train. He leaves here at 6.45 am, has breakfast on the train and gets to London at 9.30. He gets home at 7.00 in the evening for supper.
